Package net.sf.javaml.classification

Provides several classification algorithms.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Classifier Interface for all classifiers.
 

Class Summary
AbstractClassifier  
AbstractMeanClassifier Abstract classifier class that is the parent of all classifiers that require the mean of each class as training.
KDtreeKNN Implementation of the K nearest neighbor (KNN) classification algorithm with KDtree support.
KNearestNeighbors Implementation of the K nearest neighbor (KNN) classification algorithm.
MeanFeatureVotingClassifier This classifier calculates the mean for each class.
NearestMeanClassifier Nearest mean classifier.
SOM Classifier based on the Self-organized map clustering.
ZeroR ZeroR classifier implementation.
 

Package net.sf.javaml.classification Description

Provides several classification algorithms.

Related Documentation

Most detailed documentation can be found on the Java-ML homepage. That page provides background information on the library and detailed information for each of the algorithms.
